titleStmt.title: A thanksgiving-sermon for the peace: preach'd at St Michael Crookedlane, December the 2d, 1697. By James Gardiner, M.A. rector of the said parish.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, James, 1637-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for B. Aylmer, at the Three Pigeons against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
